directions: In a saucepan simmer all ingredients except vinegar and scallions, covered, stirring occasionally, until plums are falling apart, about 20 minutes. Add vinegar and simmer, uncovered, stirring frequently, until sauce is consistency of ketchup, about 10 minutes. Discard star anise or anise seeds and stir in scallions.
ingredients: 4 black plums (about 3/4 pound), cut into 1-inch chunks
1 tablespoon finely grated peeled fresh gingerroot
1 star anise or 1/4 teaspoon anise seeds
*available at specialty foods shops, Asian markets, and most supermarkets
title: Gingered Plum Barbeque Sauce
